meanings.definition: In the preceding part of this document or text.
meanings.sent1: The hereinbefore section discussed the main points.
meanings.sent2: The hereinbefore paragraph provides important context.
meanings.sent3: The hereinbefore details were surprisingly clear.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like an hereinbefore chapter, vivid and detailed.
meanings.sent5: The hereinbefore information was etched in his mind.
